description: --- tags: - translation license: apache-2.0 --- ### opus-mt-nl-en * source languages: nl * target languages: en * OPUS readme: nl-en * dataset: opus * model: transformer-align * pre-processing: normalization + SentencePiece * download original weights: opus-2019-12-05.zip * test set translations: opus-2019-12-05.test.txt * test set scores: opus-2019-12-05.eval.txt ## Benchmarks | testset | BLEU | chr-F | |-----------------------|-------|-------| | Tatoeba.nl.en | 60.9 | 0.749 |
model_explanation_gemini: Translates text from Dutch (nl) to English (en) using a transformer-based model trained on OPUS data.
